body.p: La Crosse Valley Mr. Archie Griffin of Beloit has been spending several days with friends and relatives in the neighborhood. Mr. Wm. McBain spent the week end with his family at Sandy Plains. Mr. and Mrs. H. A. Belt and family were Sunday dinner guests at John Burkeâ€™s. Mr. and Mrs. E. M. Hockenbery, called on Mr. and Mrs. Eschol Griffin last Sunday. A good crowd attended the meeting at the Grant hall Thursday. They also helped Orin Lawrence celebrate his birthday. A number of the people of the valley have been having the flu.
